name: Attack of the Fluorescent Squares
description:
Oh no! The flat untextured squares are approaching from the left side of the screen! Build towers to stop them... How many stages can you complete?

An entirely functional tower defense survival game. Made in 4 days for the first Bevy Game Jam (Theme: Unfair Advantage).

I interpreted the theme by making a "survival" game, which is a genre where the AI always wins.

Useful Hotkeys: 

  • B: Big tower
  • V: Dart tower
  • C: Fast tower
  • X: Strong tower
  • N / Space: Send next wave
  • T: Build tower (if you have enough gold)

At some point you may find yourself running low on lives; the game is working as intended.

GitHub: https://github.com/Madadog/bevy-tower-defense
